attributes.action: We should be able to view the sex offenders list! It should be made public for the safty of children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The sex offenders list should be made public for the safty of children. I have just found out that my sons grandad is a sex offender and im not aloud to see the list for his safty! What about my sons safty??

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
